AVA MediterrAegean is a modern Greek agora
Welcome to AVA MediterrAegean, an exciting venture by the
Riviera Dining Group
, established in Winter Park in 2022. From our debut, we have redefined the dining experience with our modern Greek agora concept.
At
AVA MediterrAegean
, we offer more than just a meal; we provide a multi-sensory journey that blends refined elegance with a lively, spirited atmosphere. Our name, AVA, is inspired by Greek words meaning life, water, island, and bird—elements that capture the essence of our vision and ambiance. Immerse yourself in a world where genuine hospitality meets exquisite cuisine. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or enjoying a casual night out, our vibrant setting and delectable dishes promise an unforgettable experience.
Join us at
AVA MediterrAegean
, where every moment is crafted to delight your senses and create lasting memories.
BOOK A TABLE
PHILOSOPHY+VISION
Our philosophy stands on the principles of minimalism, the beauty of our natural surroundings and the conscious belief that food is life. We understand the responsibility that comes with serving our guests and the importance of creating a unique and
refined experience
that awakens the senses.
CYCLADIC MINIMALISM
AVA MediterrAegean is an authentic experience from around the Mediterranean Sea to the rocky shores of the Aegean sea. AVA MediterrAegean is resilient but sensual, a natural beauty with a few unpolished edges. The signature design elements include columns, Mediterranean arches, traditional limestone plaster, grey tones, natural elements, and art.
Book a Private Event
DISCOVER OUR
RIVIERA DINING GROUP
OTHERS BRANDS
2022 & 2023 WINE SPECTATOR AWAR
D OF EXCELLENCE

Large Group Private Dining in Winter Park, FL
A TRANSPORTING EVENT VENUE IN WINTER PARK, TO HOST THE BEST PRIVATE GATHERINGS
AVA MediterrAegean
offers endless possibilities for private dining and special events, from intimate parties to full buyouts. Whether you're planning a cozy gathering or a grand celebration, our venue can accommodate your needs.
AVA MediterrAegean
seats up to 170 guests, with a cocktail reception capacity of 280, while AVA MM seats up to 50 guests. From hosting a 12-guest party to creating magical events such as weddings or corporate functions, our team is dedicated to making your event unforgettable. For a private consultation, please fill in the
inquiry form
below, and we will get back to you within 48 hours to help you plan the perfect event in
Winter Park, FL.
INQUIRY FORM
Brochure
Private Dining Info
For a comprehensive personal consultation, please
contact AVA MediterrAegean
Private Dining team at
events@avamediterraegean.com
DISCOVER AVA MEDITERRAEGEAN

MM Lounge - Members Only
Our Dining Options and Accommodations
We pride ourselves on offering versatile private dining options to suit any event. Brunch and dinner at AVA MediterrAegean feature several refined spaces that create a sophisticated ambiance perfect for your next gathering. From intimate dinners to large parties, we have a variety of unique spaces to fit your needs.
Private Dining  Rooms:
Enjoy exclusive use of our beautifully appointed private spaces, which are ideal for intimate dinners, business meetings, or celebratory events. Each space is designed with comfort and style in mind, ensuring a memorable experience for you and your guests.
Full Restaurant Buyouts:
For larger gatherings, consider a full restaurant buyout. This option gives you complete control over the dining environment, providing a unique setting for weddings, corporate functions, and more.
Semi-Private Spaces:
If you're looking for a blend of privacy and atmosphere, our semi-private areas offer a cozy yet open setting, perfect for medium-sized events.
No matter the size or type of your event, our flexible dining options ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.
Events That Can Be Hosted at MediterrAegean ( AVA MediterrAegean)
Our venue is equipped to handle a wide range of events, each tailored to your specific needs:
Corporate Events:
Impress your clients and colleagues with a sophisticated setting for business meetings, presentations, or team-building events. Our private spaces offer the perfect environment for focused discussions, professional networking, or even closing major deals.
Weddings and Rehearsal Dinners:
Celebrate your special day in style with our elegant private dining spaces. We provide a beautiful backdrop for your once-in-a-lifetime moments, from rehearsal dinners to wedding receptions.
Birthday Parties and Anniversaries:
Make your personal milestones even more memorable with a private dining experience. Whether it's a milestone birthday or a significant anniversary, our team will help create a celebration that reflects your style and preferences.
Holiday Gatherings:
From festive holiday parties to seasonal celebrations, our venue is ideal for creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for you and your guests.
Social Events:
Host any social event with flair, from casual get-togethers to sophisticated soirées. Our team is dedicated to ensuring every detail aligns with your vision.
Schedule an Event Today
Ready to plan your next event? Whether you need a private room restaurant in the city's heart or are searching for Orlando restaurants with party rooms that exude bespoke ambiance, AVA MediterrAegean provides the perfect setting for your next event. The dedicated team at AVA MediterrAegean is here to help you every step of the way.
Contact us
to explore our private dining options, discuss your event needs, and secure your preferred date. With a comprehensive consultation, you can be assured that we will help you create an unforgettable experience tailored just for you.
Reserve
your private dining experience today and discover why we are the leading choice for private dining in Orlando ( Winter Park). For inquiries or to book your event, please contact us directly or fill out our
online form
. We can't wait to welcome you and make your occasion extraordinary.

Contact us
to explore our private dining options, discuss your event needs, and secure your preferred date. With a comprehensive consultation, you can be assured that we will help you create an unforgettable experience tailored just for you.
Reserve
your private dining experience today and discover why we are the leading choice for private dining in Orlando ( Winter Park). For inquiries or to book your event, please contact us directly or fill out our
online form

Discover MM Membership
Secretly located at the bottom of a staircase featuring hand-polished walls and ethnic sconces inside of
AVA MediterrAegean
masterpiece bar, MM is a members-only venue that invites its guests to embark on the most unexpected and transportive Japanese culinary and mixology journey, curated by Chef Michaël Michaelidis in
Winter Park, FL.
Leaving behind the
Mediterranean inspiration
of AVA, the rich velvet curtain opens to another mesmerizing world: an intimate and luxurious speakeasy-inspired 41-seat space. Reimagining the contagious French “joie de vivre” of the Belle Époque and breathing in glamorous Art Deco touches while infusing elegant minimalistic and modern Japanese design lines, all seamlessly blending to soothe the soul and recharge the spirit.
Mm PORTAL
MM MENU
ABOUT MM
By embarking on the exclusive
MM journey
, our members get preferential status across all
venues
, allowing last-minute table
bookings
, the most exclusive treatments, special requests and private access to the members-only areas, including all of the benefits below. All venues will offer curated programming that will be available through the member portal.
DISCOVER MORE ABOUT MM MEMBERSHIP
discover mm
AwAKEN
Mindfulness, yoga, meditation sessions with special instructors, exclusive access to spa and wellness facility partners.
INDULGE
Tastings and mixology events, Private Member dinners.
CULTIVATE
Sports, art, fashion and entertainment celebration.
LOCAL MEMBERSHIP FEES
INDIVIDUAL
$2,500 per year
Guest allowance of 5 guests per member.
APPLY HERE
DUAL
(two members)
$3,000 per year
Guest allowance of 5 guests per member.
